params._maxHolderPercentage: is the new maximum percentage (multiplied by 10**16)
Maximum amount of ST20 tokens(in %) can hold by the investor

params._amount: The amount of tokens to transfer

getTokensByPartition(bytes32,address,uin.details: returning the balance of token holder against the UNLOCKED partition.  This condition is valid only when the base contract doesn't implement the `getTokensByPartition()` function.

params._valid: whether or not the address it to be added or removed from the whitelist

params._investors: Array of the addresses to whitelist
params._valids: Array of boolean value to decide whether or not the address it to be added or removed from the whitelist

reclaimERC20(address).details: We duplicate here due to the overriden owner & onlyOwner

params._tokenContract: The address of the token contract

reclaimETH().details: We duplicate here due to the overriden owner & onlyOwner

params._allowPrimaryIssuance: whether to allow all primary issuance transfers

params._amount: The amount of tokens to transfer

devdoc.title: Transfer Manager module for limiting percentage of token supply a single address can hold

changeHolderPercentage(uint256).notice: sets the maximum percentage that an individual token holder can hold

configure(uint256,bool).notice: Used to intialize the variables of the contract

executeTransfer(address,address,uint256,.notice: Used to verify the transfer transaction and prevent a given account to end up with more tokens than allowed

getDataStore().notice: used to return the data store address of securityToken

getInitFunction().notice: This function returns the signature of configure function

getPermissions().notice: Return the permissions flag that are associated with Percentage transfer Manager

getTokensByPartition(bytes32,address,uin.notice: return the amount of tokens for a given user as per the partition

modifyWhitelist(address,bool).notice: adds or removes addresses from the whitelist.

modifyWhitelistMulti(address[],bool[]).notice: adds or removes addresses from the whitelist.

setAllowPrimaryIssuance(bool).notice: sets whether or not to consider primary issuance transfers

verifyTransfer(address,address,uint256,b.notice: Used to verify the transfer transaction and prevent a given account to end up with more tokens than allowed
